trans-unit.source: Represents a collection of <xref href="System.Web.UI.UpdatePanelTrigger"></xref> objects for an <xref href="System.Web.UI.UpdatePanel"></xref> control.

Triggers in the <xref:System.Web.UI.UpdatePanelTrigger> collection are specified by using the **UpdatePanelTrigger Collection Editor** in the designer or by adding them declaratively as `<Triggers>` elements inside the <xref:System.Web.UI.UpdatePanel> control.
You can add two types of triggers:
An <xref:System.Web.UI.AsyncPostBackTrigger> object that can be used to specify that a control can cause an asynchronous postback and refresh the update panel's contents.
The <xref:System.Web.UI.AsyncPostBackTrigger> object is used for controls outside an update panel or controls that are not immediate child controls of an <xref:System.Web.UI.UpdatePanel> control.

A <xref:System.Web.UI.PostBackTrigger> object that can be used to specify that a postback control inside an <xref:System.Web.UI.UpdatePanel> control can cause a synchronous postback and a full-page refresh.
Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Web.UI.UpdatePanelTrigger"></xref> collection class.

You typically add triggers to an <xref:System.Web.UI.UpdatePanel> control by using the **UpdatePanelTrigger Collection Editor** in the designer or by adding them declaratively as `<Triggers>` elements inside the <xref:System.Web.UI.UpdatePanel> control.
The <xref href="System.Web.UI.UpdatePanel"></xref> control that the <xref href="System.Web.UI.UpdatePanelTriggerCollection"></xref> belongs to.
Removes all elements from the <xref href="System.Web.UI.UpdatePanelTriggerCollection"></xref>.
Inserts an <xref href="System.Web.UI.UpdatePanelTrigger"></xref> object into the <xref href="System.Web.UI.UpdatePanelTriggerCollection"></xref> object at the specified index.
You can add <xref:System.Web.UI.AsyncPostBackTrigger> objects, <xref:System.Web.UI.PostBackTrigger> objects, or any custom trigger that derives from <xref:System.Web.UI.UpdatePanelTrigger>.
The zero-based index at which the trigger should be inserted.
The trigger to insert.
The value can be `null` for reference types.
Gets a reference to the <xref href="System.Web.UI.UpdatePanel"></xref> control that the <xref href="System.Web.UI.UpdatePanelTriggerCollection"></xref> belongs to.
An <xref href="System.Web.UI.UpdatePanel"></xref> control.
Removes the element at the specified index of the <xref href="System.Web.UI.UpdatePanelTriggerCollection"></xref>.
The zero-based index of the element to remove.
Replaces the trigger at the specified index in the <xref href="System.Web.UI.UpdatePanelTriggerCollection"></xref> object.

You can replace an element in the <xref:System.Web.UI.UpdatePanelTriggerCollection> object with an <xref:System.Web.UI.AsyncPostBackTrigger> object, a <xref:System.Web.UI.PostBackTrigger> object, or any custom trigger that derives from <xref:System.Web.UI.UpdatePanelTrigger>.
The zero-based index of the trigger to replace.
The new value for the trigger at the specified index.
The value can be `null` for reference types.
